alert.note: Alert for Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Southwest San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:52AM MST until March 10 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected, heavy at times. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southwest San Juan Mountains, Northwest San Juan Mountains and Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide, including U.S. Highway 550. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times due to icy and snow packed roadways. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Southwest San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
